fields.description: The date/time when the code location was created
The sum of the size(s) of all scans associated with the code location
URL specifying the project version linked to the code location
The general summary/identifier of the code location
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
URL describing the location of the source
The date/time when the code location was updated

links.description: Resource listing scans associated with code location
Resource for the latest scan associated with the code location
Resource listing the Bill of Materials for the project version associated with the code location
A link to download the file that was scanned to create this code location
